alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 3:24PM EST until January 23 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with localized amounts up to 5 inches. * WHERE...Northern Oneida, Yates, Seneca, Southern Cayuga and Onondaga counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The steadiest snow will fall late this evening, overnight and into early Monday morning. Temperatures will be in the upper 20s to lower 30s which will make for a heavy wet snowfall, especially in the lower elevations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Yates
